content: smitten with the Mermaid Princess. He started sending love letters, then packages, and then threatening marriage proposals. This prompted King Neptune and the princes to form an army to search for Vander Decken, but they have not had any luck finding him. When Brook asks about the legend surrounding Decken, Pappag reveals that it was just an exaggeration of the myth and that the Vander Decken from the legend died on Fish-Man Island. The one running around is his descendant, Vander Decken IX.
